snippet.title: Galago – Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3572900/Galago/

Galago is an upcoming 2D exploration-platformer, blending puzzle-solving, survival, and mystery. I've been working on this as a solo project in my free time for the past 2 years.

Find the 6 golden fireflies per level. Some are hidden, others are in plain-sight, yet seemingly out of reach... While you explore, your endeavour will be hindered by hunger, hazards and predators. To survive, you must forage for tree sap and insects. This is not the galago's natural habitat — you are in the city's wealthiest suburb. As you skitter along walls, peering through warmly lit windows, what stories might you witness?

Full game planned for release 2026.

Twitter: https://x.com/GalagoGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/galagogame/

© Ruben Cruy. All rights reserved.

Sound attribution:
crunch 7.wav by theplax -- https://freesound.org/s/608641/ -- License: Attribution 4.0 - pitch shifted
crunch 8.wav by theplax -- https://freesound.org/s/608643/ -- License: Attribution 4.0 - pitch shifted
Church_Barn_Owl.aif by ikbenraar -- https://freesound.org/s/181134/ -- License: Creative Commons 0
Tawny Owl by faxfaxfax -- https://freesound.org/s/655380/ -- License: Creative Commons 0
Fountain.wav by mikaelfernstrom -- https://freesound.org/s/68692/ -- License: Attribution 4.0
Slight cricket singing with silent breeze recorded at night in the desert at Bagdad California by felix.blume -- https://freesound.org/s/651241/ -- License: Creative Commons 0
Branch Impact.wav by shatterstars -- https://freesound.org/s/651319/ -- License: Creative Commons 0

#galago #indiegame #gametrailer #exploration #platformer #2d
